text: (al kuraan 2-30) me mihimatha manushyayeku mawannata thindu kala puwatha allah (dewi) wisin ‘malaikawarun’ (dewa duthayan) hata pawasu kalhi owun dakwu prathicharaya wuye ‘polowe anarthakam kara le wagurana ayawada mawannata yanne?’

ohe aathata pawena me sulanga....hemihita aatha indan aran enawa mage punchi kumarige suwanda...dannawada man me suwandata kochchara aadareyida kiyala....oyata puluwani nam awith poddak kana thiyanna..mage me hadawathata..aheyi katawath ahenne nathi wenna kiyana aadare...mathakayida api hamu wuna ee dawasa...
